From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

OOC: Youp, that fan fic is nothing more then wishful pro Hot Rod
propaganda.

::DrillBit::

He heard a rumble in the distance, then small explosians. It didn't take
long to figure out what had happaned. His and Killfests base had been
destroyed. But by who? And how?
"Killfest, the base...!"

::Dollen::

He was in a CR chamber when the base began to vaporize to nothing.
With the system down, he made his escape. In the end he was cought under
whatever ruble wasn't destroyed. Shrapnel was sticking through his body,
and he was dieing.... again!
